meta_concepts.builds: Items vary by role: Tanks build defensive items, ADCs build crit/attack speed, Mages build AP
meta_concepts.objectives: Dragon provides team buffs, Baron empowers minions, Elder Dragon gives execute damage
meta_concepts.strategy: Early game: Farm and ward. Mid game: Team fights around objectives. Late game: Protect carries

meta_concepts.economy: Buy weapons and abilities with credits earned from rounds
meta_concepts.agents: Each agent has unique abilities: Duelists entry frag, Controllers block vision, Sentinels defend
meta_concepts.strategy: Attack: Execute site takes with utility. Defense: Hold angles and retake with utility

meta_concepts.economy: Buy weapons with money from kills/rounds. Save rounds when low on money
meta_concepts.weapons: AK-47 and M4A4 are primary rifles. AWP is sniper. Pistols for eco rounds
meta_concepts.strategy: T-side: Execute site takes with smokes and flashes. CT-side: Hold angles and retake

meta_concepts.items: Items provide stats and abilities. Key items: Blink Dagger, Black King Bar, Aegis of Immortal
meta_concepts.objectives: Roshan drops Aegis (revive) and cheese. Towers give gold and map control
meta_concepts.strategy: Early: Farm and gank. Mid: Team fights. Late: Protect carry and push

meta_concepts.legends: Each legend has tactical, passive, and ultimate abilities. Team composition matters
meta_concepts.weapons: Weapon tiers: Common (white), Rare (blue), Epic (purple), Legendary (gold)
meta_concepts.strategy: Early: Loot quickly. Mid: Rotate and third-party. Late: Position for final ring

meta_concepts.team_comp: 2-2-2 role lock: 2 Tanks, 2 Damage, 2 Support. Synergy between heroes matters
meta_concepts.ultimates: Each hero has powerful ultimate ability. Coordinate ultimates for team fights
meta_concepts.strategy: Tanks create space, Damage secure kills, Support keeps team alive

key_info.maps: Single map that changes each season

meta_concepts.building: Build walls, ramps, floors for defense and mobility. Edit structures quickly
meta_concepts.weapons: Weapon rarities: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Epic, Legendary
meta_concepts.strategy: Early: Land safely and loot. Mid: Rotate and engage. Late: Build and position
